10-132-1-0.label: Wake-up Interval
10-132-1-0.help: How often the Device will Wake up to check for pending commands

10-114-1-0.label: Loaded Config Revision
10-114-1-0.help: Revision of the Config file currently loaded

10-114-1-1.label: Config File Revision
10-114-1-1.help: Revision of the Config file on the File System

10-114-1-2.label: Latest Available Config File Revision
10-114-1-2.help: Latest Revision of the Config file available for download

10-112-1-1.label: Touch sound
10-112-1-1.help: This will enable or disable the sound effects when you press or touch the sensing area

10-112-1-2.label: Touch vibration
10-112-1-2.help: This will enable or disable the vibration effects when you press or touch the sensing area

10-112-1-3.label: Button slide function
10-112-1-3.help: This will enable or disable control by sliding the button area

10-112-1-4.label: Report type
10-112-1-4.help: To configure which report will be sent when pressing the buttons
values: Send Central Scene Command Notification and Configuration report

10-112-1-5.label: Color when button is pressed
10-112-1-5.help: To configure which color will be displayed when the button is pressed. Value 1: (msb) Red. Value 2: Green. Value 3: Blue. Value 4: Reserved

10-112-1-33.label: Test the LED, buzzer and vibrator
10-112-1-33.help: Get the LED Strip color value Value 1: (msb) Red. Value 2: Green. Value 3: Blue. Value 4: buzzer and vibrator. (1=ON, 0=OFF)

10-112-1-39.label: Set the low battery value
10-112-1-39.help: Set the low battery value. Range: 10% - 50%.

10-112-1-255.label: Reset To Factory Defaults
values: Reset to factory default setting and removed from the z-wave network

10-94-1-0.label: Instance 1: ZWave+ Version
10-94-1-0.help: ZWave+ Version Supported on the Device

10-94-1-1.label: Instance 1: InstallerIcon
10-94-1-1.help: Icon File to use for the Installer Application

10-94-1-2.label: Instance 1: UserIcon
10-94-1-2.help: Icon File to use for the User Application

10-115-1-1.label: Timeout
10-115-1-1.help: Timeout till the PowerLevel is reset to Normal

10-115-1-2.label: Set Powerlevel
10-115-1-2.help: Apply the Output PowerLevel and Timeout Values

10-115-1-3.label: Test Node
10-115-1-3.help: Node to Perform a test against

10-115-1-4.label: Test Powerlevel
10-115-1-4.help: PowerLevel to use for the Test

10-115-1-5.label: Frame Count
10-115-1-5.help: How Many Messages to send to the Note for the Test

10-115-1-6.label: Test
10-115-1-6.help: Perform a PowerLevel Test against the a Node

10-115-1-7.label: Report
10-115-1-7.help: Get the results of the latest PowerLevel Test against a Node

10-115-1-8.label: Test Status
10-115-1-8.help: The Current Status of the last PowerNode Test Executed

10-115-1-9.label: Acked Frames
10-115-1-9.help: Number of Messages successfully Acked by the Target Node

10-132-1-1.label: Minimum Wake-up Interval
10-132-1-1.help: Minimum Time in seconds the device will wake up

10-132-1-2.label: Maximum Wake-up Interval
10-132-1-2.help: Maximum Time in seconds the device will wake up

10-132-1-3.label: Default Wake-up Interval
10-132-1-3.help: The Default Wake-Up Interval the device will wake up

1-pressed.description: Top Left button pressed and released quickly

1-released.description: Top Left button released after being held

1-longPressed.description: Top Left button pressed and held

2-pressed.description: Top Right button pressed and released quickly

2-released.description: Top Right button released after being held

2-longPressed.description: Top Right button pressed and held

3-pressed.description: Bottom Left button pressed and released quickly

3-released.description: Bottom Left button released after being held

3-longPressed.description: Bottom Left button pressed and held

4-pressed.description: Bottom Right button pressed and released quickly

4-released.description: Bottom Right button released after being held

4-longPressed.description: Bottom Right button pressed and held
